column5: Just a first hand thumbs up review on their on-line ordering. I have no association with the store.  Ordered an auger extension for my Jiffy power auger, a set of curved blades for my 8" Fin-Bore III and the lazer deluxe sharpener on Jan 5th. Order was shipped on the 8th and received today.  Fair pricing, fair postage costs and best of all no PST !  www.wholesalesports.com   ....and yes I try to shop local ! BUT...Nobody had an extension.. nobody had curved blades. LOTS had Swedebore blades.. no Fin Bore.

great to hear Irish!  its nice to hear some good news re: purchasing/customer service with all the nightmare crap i'm goin through with a particular shop.   I think i might be needing an auger extension too this year...its bloody cold!
I have ordered from Wholesale sports several times, and have always been impressed with the fast service, and the pleasant people at the other end of the phone.
Hey Wayne how do you like the fin bore? Is it better then the swede bore?  I have a 6" and an 8" swede bore but i am thinking about getting a 8" fin bore.
Auger works great when sharp.... and when my right arms mobility is cooperating for the offset handles. I have no experience with the swede bore to compare.
Ok i think i will try the fin bore.  Thanks.
i have one of each and can drill a hole much faster with sweede and if u are drilling a hole in an ice shack its hard with the fin bore your knuckles hit the wall way too much!
Well if you wanna try before you buy.... you know where I live!
